lines.text: A. CASH FLOWS FROM OPERATING ACTIVITIES
- Debts, deposits, loans and advances, etc.
Dividends from current and long-term investments
Profit on redemption/ sale of long-term investments
Profit on sale of current investments
Exchange (gain)/ loss on foreign currency bank balance
Exchange (gain)/loss on long-term foreign currency borrowings
Provision for decline in the value of Investments written back
Loss on sale of fixed asset
Operating profit before working capital changes
B. CASH FLOWS FROM INVESTING ACTIVITIES
Proceeds from sale of fixed assets
Purchase of current and long-term investments
Proceeds from sale of current and long-term investments
Dividends from current and long-term investments
Net cash used in investing activities
C. CASH FLOWS FROM FINANCING ACTIVITIES
Proceeds from/ (Repayment of) short-term bank borrowings
Net cash used in financing activities
NET (DECREASE)/INCREASE IN CASH AND CASH EQUIVALENTS
Effect of exchange rate changes on exchange earner
Includes bank fixed deposits lodged a
By deposits with banks aggregating to Rs.846.54 lacs as at March 31, 2012
In terms of our report attached
For and on behalf of the Board of Directors
